NewsArticle.Title: Peasant Day
NewsArticle.Content:
Raylan, minor crystal miner of Mt. Girigan writes,
"My eyes have been playing tricks on me lately. I could swear that pile of snow moved. Some tree sauntered! Honest! I guess an ordinary boy with mundane eyes like me lacks the insight to tell what's real from what's snow-blind illusion. I bet chasing down illusions is work for dreamers, for Aislings. Sounds like a great way for an Aisling of the utmost insight to prove their metal, if you ask me."
